Question: In 1999, this person was ranked as the sixth-greatest female star of all time by the American Film Institute.
Hints: This person eloped with Joe DiMaggio at San Francisco City Hall on January 14, 1954.
Four films in which this person featured were released beginning in 1952.
In July 2010, this person's Brentwood home was put up for sale by Prudential California Realty.
